title: Exemplary Female Education Retention
description: In 2020, Portugal achieved a 100% persistence rate for females reaching both grade 5 and the last grade of primary education, showcasing its commitment to female education.

title: Top-tier Labor Regulation Quality
description: Portugal's labor regulations were rated at 88.23 in 2024, placing it among the countries with the highest quality labor regulations globally.

title: Outstanding Trade Regulation Standards
description: In 2024, Portugal's international trade regulations scored 88.92, indicating a robust framework that supports efficient and fair trade practices.
